languages.text: "Как удивительно осознавать, что Ангелы Императора смертны... Хотя, кто знает наверняка, что Бог Человечества уготовил для своих детей после смерти?"
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Ulfar's second quest (to help him put the spirits of his brothers to rest on an icy world).
Argenta: "Brother Ulfar, do you not wish to pray for the souls of your brothers so that they find their way to the Golden Throne?"

traits.locale_text: "Как удивительно осознавать, что Ангелы Императора смертны... Хотя, кто знает наверняка, что Бог-Человечества уготовил для своих детей после смерти?"

languages.text: "It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Ulfar's second quest (to help him put the spirits of his brothers to rest on an icy world).
Argenta: "Brother Ulfar, do you not wish to pray for the souls of your brothers so that they find their way to the Golden Throne?"
languages.original_text: "Как удивительно осознавать, что Ангелы Императора смертны... Хотя, кто знает наверняка, что Бог Человечества уготовил для своих детей после смерти?"

traits.locale_text: "It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"
"It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"

"It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"
"It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"

languages.text: 「皇帝の天使たちも死すべき存在なのだと気づかされるのは、衝撃的なことだ…だが一方で、人類の神がその死の先に、御子たちに何を用意しておられるかなど、誰にも分からないのだろうな」
languages.original_text: "It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の天使たちも死すべき存在なのだと気づかされるのは、衝撃的なことだ…だが一方で、人類の神がその死の先に、御子たちに何を用意しておられるかなど、誰にも分からないのだろうな」

languages.text: "Eine atemberaubende Erkenntnis, dass die Engel des Imperators sterblich sind ... Andererseits: Wer weiß, was der Gott der Menschheit nach ihrem Tod für seine Kinder bereithält?"
languages.original_text: "It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"

traits.locale_text: "Eine atemberaubende Erkenntnis, dass die Engel des Imperators sterblich sind ... Andererseits: Wer weiß, was der Gott der Menschheit nach ihrem Tod für seine Kinder bereithält?"

languages.text: « Je découvre avec la plus grande stupéfaction que les anges de l'Empereur sont mortels... Cela dit, qui sait ce que le dieu de l'humanité réserve à Ses enfants après leur mort ? »
languages.original_text: "It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"

traits.locale_text: « Je découvre avec la plus grande stupéfaction que les anges de l'Empereur sont mortels... Cela dit, qui sait ce que le dieu de l'humanité réserve à Ses enfants après leur mort ? »

languages.text: «Es increíble constatar que los ángeles del Emperador son mortales... Por otra parte, ¿quién puede saber lo que el Dios de la Humanidad depara a Sus hijos tras la muerte?».
languages.original_text: "It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"

traits.locale_text: «Es increíble constatar que los ángeles del Emperador son mortales... Por otra parte, ¿quién puede saber lo que el Dios de la Humanidad depara a Sus hijos tras la muerte?».

languages.text: “没想到帝皇的天使也会死，这实在是令人震惊……但话说回来，又有谁知道天使死去之后，人类之神又为他们准备了什么呢？”
languages.original_text: "It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"

traits.locale_text: “没想到帝皇的天使也会死，这实在是令人震惊……但话说回来，又有谁知道天使死去之后，人类之神又为他们准备了什么呢？”

languages.text: "İmparator'un Melekleri'nin fâni olduğunu öğrenmek beni sarstı. İnsanlığın Tanrısı'nın kullarını öbür dünyada ne bekliyor, kim bilir?"
languages.original_text: "It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un Melekleri'nin fâni olduğunu öğrenmek beni sarstı. İnsanlığın Tanrısı'nın kullarını öbür dünyada ne bekliyor, kim bilir?"

languages.original_text: "It is staggering to realise that the Emperor's Angels are mortal... Then again, who knows what the God of Humanity has in store for His children after their death?"
